sagex.phoenix.fanart

Class LocalFanartSupport2

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.fanart.LocalFanartSupport2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFanartSupport2

    public class LocalFanartSupport2
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFanartSupport2
    Local Fanart Support implements the FanartAPI but only looks for Fanart, in the Local Directory. ie, backdrops, banners, etc reside in the same directory as the local file.
